background_dashed.customLabel: In NA participants, there is a small-to-moderate effect in favor of FOLI on Overall ASD symptoms. Based on the analysis of the quality of the evidence produced by the 2 clinical trials exploring this effect, we have a very low confidence in the estimation of this effect.

In NA participants, there is a moderate-to-strong effect in favor of FOLI on Social-communication. Based on the analysis of the quality of the evidence produced by the 2 clinical trials exploring this effect, we have a very low confidence in the estimation of this effect.
